message.entry: Zero value cannot be used when using a row vector for subspace orders.
Model estimation failed. Check that the estimation data is sufficiently exciting. Try lower orders.
Specified orders are too high for search of optimal state-space model orders. Reduce the order values or use data with more samples.
There are too many parameters to estimate for chosen estimation data size. Reduce model order or use a larger data set.
Estimation of the model disturbance component failed. It has been set to zero in the estimated model.
The period of the PRBS signal was changed to {0,number,integer}. Accordingly, the length of the generated signal will be {1,number,integer}.
The PRBS signal delivered is the {0,number,integer} first values of a full sequence of length {1,number,integer}.
The period of the PRBS sequence must be between {0} and 2^{1}-1.
Unspecified sample time (Ts=-1). It will be treated as Ts=1.
Quality of fit deterioration is detected. Consider a relative degree closer to 0.
Invalid system description in S, the first argument. See function help for valid values.
Expected parameters in param.Continuous objects to be row vectors.
Relative degree cannot be larger than the denominator order. Assuming they are equal.
Denominator parameter constraints imply Inf response at DC frequency. Remove the data at 0 rad/s.
Denominator parameter constraints imply Inf response at Nyquist frequency (pi/SampleTime). Remove the data at or very near the Nyquist frequency.
